title: Maidak
author: Maidak
content: As the title states this is what i'm looking for we will meet in person to handle the transaction. You will need to sign a message with the key holding the amount I'm looking for and I am looking for a discounted rate not a inflated rate obviously with the amount i'm looking at purchasing..

comments.author: alertoriole
comments.body: you wouldn't break the transaction up? world is a big place, how are you intending on buying it.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: Maidak on October 02, 2023, 09:19:23 AMAs the title states this is what i'm looking for we will meet in person to handle the transaction. You will need to sign a message with the key holding the amount I'm looking for and I am looking for a discounted rate not a inflated rate obviously with the amount i'm looking at purchasing.. First, you need to prove you actually have that kind of money. Second, what's wrong with an OTC desk?

comments.author: LoyceMobile
comments.body: How to get robbed by someone who ran off with other people's money already.

comments.author: Maidak
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on October 02, 2023, 07:20:28 PMHow to get robbed by someone who ran off with other people's money already.To clarify this a bit the person who was well quite literally the only competition when it came to buying an selling crypto sold me a bunk ass paypal mycash card. So i never paid him for it, and he accused me of theft and i just said forget it he already banned my paypal account on my business i'm not even going to fight it. The next thing is everyone elses funds were returned with the exception of the one person who had just a slightly lower thread view count then me.Now to business we will be meeting in person either at your office or mine if you don't mind the travel. As for an OTC desk the only one i knew was bitcoin-otc.com and they're not to active anymore. So if their is a new one please fill me in on it.

Perfect clean coins , no discount you pay me extra 3%!

This is the best you're going to get: https://www.kraken.com/features/otc-exchange

comments.author: Pidgeon
comments.body: Quote from: Maidak on October 03, 2023, 08:54:18 AMI'm looking for a discount on this of at least 7-11% Oh, what a relief, you're just looking for a 11% discount, and here I was trembling in fear you might want to scam me, really shows how easy it is to mistake people's intentions, you for wanting to scam somebody and me for trolling you. I'm having second thoughts now, maybe a buddy of mine in Midlands would be able to help, since you're fee to travel he lives around  B77 4LA , that's close to Scammerton in Tamworth.

You will need to sign a message with the key holding the amount I'm looking for and I am looking for a discounted rate not a inflated rate obviously with the amount i'm looking at purchasing.. There are people willing to rob and kill another person for like $1000 , with a 36.9 Million deal you can imagine my thought about this deal.Your only answer will be: My people are trusted businessmen.

comments.author: msin
comments.body: Quote from: Maidak on October 06, 2023, 01:31:59 PMQuote from: Pidgeon on October 03, 2023, 10:36:25 AMQuote from: Maidak on October 03, 2023, 08:54:18 AMI'm looking for a discount on this of at least 7-11% Oh, what a relief, you're just looking for a 11% discount, and here I was trembling in fear you might want to scam me, really shows how easy it is to mistake people's intentions, you for wanting to scam somebody and me for trolling you. I'm having second thoughts now, maybe a buddy of mine in Midlands would be able to help, since you're fee to travel he lives around  B77 4LA , that's close to Scammerton in Tamworth.Okay looking at spot price for them thenWhy would anyone even sell to you at spot? USD can be frozen in any bank account in minutes by authorities. Bitcoin is where the rich will eventually put their money to avoid divorce settlement, estate tax, wealth tax, etc.. It's already happening.Call someone at Gemini, or Coinbase and ask if you can buy OTC.

comments.author: BabyBandit
